snippet.title: Upheaval - Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
PLAY THE DEMO https://store.steampowered.com/app/2253300/Upheaval/?utm_source=youtube

Upheaval is a text-based open world fantasy adventure roguelike where you must master the secrets of a changing world 30 days at a time.

Explore the wilds around a remote village as you track down magic treasures, aid or disrupt factions, and match wits with an enigmatic Magician. Be ready: Upheaval is coming! 

Play the demo on Steam and Wishlist now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2253300/Upheaval/?utm_source=youtube

Other Links:

Press kit: https://upheavalgame.com/press
itch.io:  https://leonegaming.itch.io/upheaval
Discord: https://upheavalgame.com/discord
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AlexLeoneGames
